Podcasts.Title: A Man Called Paul
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3003 — Romans 1:1
A spiritual approach necessary; importance of this Epistle in the history of the church; the conversion and preparation of Paul; the false contrast between natural gifts and Holy Spirit.

Podcasts.Title: Analysis
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3004 — Romans 1:1
The readers and their background; the foundations and character of the church; the reason for writing; to establish them in the truth; analysis of the Epistle; chapters 4 to eight concerned with the certainty of salvation.

Podcasts.Title: Paul; a Servant of Jesus Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3005 — Romans 1:1
The centrality of Christ; the bond-slave; redeemed and captivated by Christ; the true definition of an apostle; his marks and authority; Paul's call by the risen Lord.

Podcasts.Title: Paul; an Apostle of Jesus Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3006 — Romans 1:1
Paul's apostolic qualifications; his equality with the others; his mission to the Gentiles; relevance; then and now; 'apostolic succession'; separated from his mother's womb.

Podcasts.Title: The Gospel of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3007 — Romans 1:1
The significance of the word 'gospel'; the greatest good news we have heard; the gospel of God in three persons; the primacy of the Father; the limitations of apologetics.

Podcasts.Title: Promised by His Prophets
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3008 — Romans 1:2
Paul's method of reasoning from the Old Testament; the promises; prophesies and types; forth-telling and fore-telling; revelation and inspiration according to Peter; holy writings; the Word of God.

Podcasts.Title: The Holy Scriptures
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3009 — Romans 1:2
The delay in Christ's coming; the use of the Old Testament to prove the continuity of the gospel; the true nature of the church and the doctrine of the remnant; the sufficiency; authority; unity; necessity and consistency of the Scriptures; the consolation of the Old Testament.

Podcasts.Title: Concerning His Son
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3010 — Romans 1:3-4
Christ Himself the centre of the gospel; the Son of God incarnate; His true humanity; the link with prophecy and especially the house of David; relevance today.

Podcasts.Title: Declared to Be the Son of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3011 — Romans 1:3-4
A series of contrasts; made : declared; weakness : power; flesh : the spirit of holiness; the significance of the resurrection; the inauguration of the God-man as mediator.

Podcasts.Title: Jesus Christ; Our Lord
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3012 — Romans 1:3-5
The Lordship of Jesus; Jesus Christ; the anointed Saviour; prophet; priest and king; the impossibility of separating Saviour and Lord; the basis of all that Paul is and does; the obedience of faith.

Podcasts.Title: Saviour of the World
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3013 — Romans 1:3-5
Committal and submission; Christmas Evans and Sandemanism; a gospel for all nations; for the sake of the name of Christ; glorifying Christ by word; life and witness.

Podcasts.Title: The Called of Jesus Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3014 — Romans 1:6-7
Belonging to Jesus Christ; the foundation; beloved of God; general and effectual calling; separated to God and His praise; saints and saintliness.

Podcasts.Title: Grace and Truth ... by Jesus Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3015 — Romans 1:6-7
Doctrine and practice; grace leading to peace with God; experiencing the peace of God; implicit doctrines; a remarkable and encouraging work of God in Rome.

Podcasts.Title: My God; Through Jesus Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3016 — Romans 1:7-15
Paul's desire to visit Rome; strengthening the babes in Christ; form and substance; the Apostle's prayer life; thanksgiving through Christ; a great intercessor.

Podcasts.Title: Submitted to the Will of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3017 — Romans 1:7-15
Desire; prayer and submission to God's will; prospered by God; hindrances and guidance; persevering in prayer; 'man proposes but God disposes'.

Podcasts.Title: Called to Preach
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3018 — Romans 1:7-15
Paul's attitude to his work; religious service; the danger of merely external service; carnal and spiritual methods; carnal zeal and divine passion; 'boundless charity divine'.

Podcasts.Title: Serving God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3019 — Romans 1:7-15
The Apostle's self-imposed limits; the riches of the gospel; the power and authority of the Holy Spirit; establishing through teaching.

Podcasts.Title: The Fellowship of Believers
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3020 — Romans 1:7-15
Paul's genuine modesty; the real test of a believer; spiritual authority and Catholicism; the church as a fellowship; the Apostle's encouragement from their faith; the danger of 'movements'.

Podcasts.Title: The Whole Counsel of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3021 — Romans 1:14
Under obligation to preach the gospel; the ability to pass on the gospel; the universal need of all nations and all types of men; Paul's ability to reach all men; the whole gospel for the whole man; the constraint.

Podcasts.Title: Not Ashamed of the Gospel
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3022 — Romans 1:16-17
Logical method; being ashamed of the gospel; the offence of the cross; a fool for Christ's sake; popular false gospels; the right reason for being unashamed; unique power to save.

Podcasts.Title: God's Great Plan of Salvation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3023 — Romans 1:16-17
Glorious good news; a threefold deliverance from sin; reconciliation and restoration; salvation; past; present and future; God's way.

Podcasts.Title: The Power ... unto Salvation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3024 — Romans 1:16-17
God's saving power; the efficacy of the gospel; the Word and the Spirit; the divine prescription; for the Jew first; hope for all.

Podcasts.Title: Righteousness of God Revealed
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3025 — Romans 1:16-17
A revealed gospel; a righteousness acceptable to God; clothed with Christ's righteousness; the uniqueness of Christian faith; the instrument; Luther and Habakkuk.

Podcasts.Title: The Just Shall Live By Faith
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3026 — Romans 1:16-17
Recapitulation; the importance of the section; 1:18; 3:20; the necessity of the gospel proved; the history and futility of civilisation; general analysis of the section.

Podcasts.Title: The Wrath of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3027 — Romans 1:18
Beginning with our relationship to God; experience and the cults; unbelieving and modernist attitudes to God's wrath; a controlling conception for scriptural evangelism; the New Testament evidence; the practice of our Lord; the apostles and the great evangelists

Podcasts.Title: The Wrath of God Revealed
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3028 — Romans 1:18
The nature of God's wrath; ways in which it is revealed; judgements in history; wrath and the cross; wrath now and later.

Podcasts.Title: Ungodliness
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3029 — Romans 1:18
The character of sin; ungodliness and unrighteousness; connection and order; sins and sin; mere morality and the social gospel; man-centred religion; true evangelism.

Podcasts.Title: Their Foolish Heart was Darkened
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3030 — Romans 1:18-20
Man's utter inexcusability; a universal sense of God; God manifested in creation; providence and history; general and special revelation; suppressing the truth; proud and wicked philosophy.

Podcasts.Title: They Became Fools
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 1 — #3031 — Romans 1:18-32
The rejection of God; idolatry and mythology; reverence before the God of the Bible; folly and foulness; judicial abandonment; the need for revival.

Podcasts.Title: Declared with Power
Podcasts.Description:
Other Sermons — #5506 — Romans 1:1-4
The facts concerning Jesus Christ; the uniqueness of the event; the proof of the Resurrection.

Podcasts.Title: Thou Art Inexcusable. O Man
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3032 — Romans 2:1
Connection with chapter one; the man being addressed; the Jew; the law and circumcision; the subtlety of sin in denying justification by faith; separation of doctrine and life.

Podcasts.Title: Judged According to Truth
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3033 — Romans 2:1
Proof that the Jews; too; are without excuse; the essence and attitude of sin; denouncing others; condemning ourselves; judgement according to truth; penetrating and impartial judgement.

Podcasts.Title: The Longsuffering of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3034 — Romans 2:2-3
Judgement and the nature of the atonement; no escaping the judgement of God; misuse of God's goodness to deny judgement; a low estimate of the riches of God's goodness; forbearance and longsuffering.

Podcasts.Title: Repentance and God's Goodness
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3035 — Romans 2:2-4
Long-suffering considered as a licence to sin; insulting God; God's design in repentance; constraining grace not irresistible; the priority and necessity of repentance.

Podcasts.Title: The Heart and Mind of Man
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3036 — Romans 2:4-5
The meaning of repentance; changing our mind and our course of action; our attitude to God; ourselves; life and death; a hard and impenitent heart in control; the treasury of wrath.

Podcasts.Title: The Day of Judgement
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3037 — Romans 2:6-10
Universal; but individual; judgement; no privileged positions; judgement according to works; the tests of the righteous and unrighteous; their attitude; general tenor of life and practice; the two destinies.

Podcasts.Title: ... To ... Man that Worketh Good
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3038 — Romans 2:6-10
Justification by works and the context; the grounds of condemnation and the evidence of faith; the dangers of Sandemanism; antinomianism and believism.

Podcasts.Title: The Judgement Throne of Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3039 — Romans 2:11-16
God is unbiased; Jews; Gentiles and the law; judgement according to our situation; the Jews' greater opportunity; Christ; the Judge who knows our secrets; Paul's gospel.

Podcasts.Title: Written in their Hearts
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3040 — Romans 2:13-15
The parenthesis; doing the law; not hearing it;is what counts; the Gentiles' moral consciousness proved; three false deductions about their condition; the impossibility of 'living up to our light'.

Podcasts.Title: None Righteous
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3041 — Romans 2:13-15
God's standards; both Jews and Gentiles condemned; objections about 'righteous' people; 'noble' philosophers and 'good' pagans; application to the Jews in terms of their failure to act according to their knowledge.

Podcasts.Title: Hypocrisy
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3042 — Romans 2:17-24
Jewish hypocrisy exposed; intellectualism ; complacency and lack of self-examination; failure to practise what they preach; effect on the Gentiles' opinion of God and the gospel; external and inward circumcision; let every man examine himself.

Podcasts.Title: Stewards of the Mysteries
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3043 — Romans 3:1-2
Analysis of chapter three; the Jews' privilege of having the oracles of God; our duty to defend the Scriptures entrusted to us and to pass them on; Christian parents and their children.

Podcasts.Title: The Faith of God Without Effect?
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3044 — Romans 3:3
What about Jewish unbelief? God's faithfulness; truth and justice are not to be questioned; false logic of another objection condemned; how to deal with difficulties; inevitable exposure to the charge of antinomianism.

Podcasts.Title: There is None Righteous
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3045 — Romans 3:9-20
Only two categories of men; all are under sin since the Fall; Paul's chain of evidence; the primacy of conviction of sin; the blackness of sin and the glory of grace; the plan of the quotations; no one is truly righteous.

Podcasts.Title: Man Under Sin
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3046 — Romans 3:10-12
Man's condition as a result of sin; lack of spiritual understanding; the meaning of seeking God; the general effects of sin on our conduct; a terrifying mirror: the particular manifestations of sin in word and deed.

Podcasts.Title: The Fear of the Lord
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 2 — #3047 — Romans 3:18-20
The fear of God: reverence; worship and an awareness of God the Judge; the argument summarised; examples of the whole world speechless before God; universal liability to God's wrath; thanksgiving and praise for the blood of Christ.

Podcasts.Title: Justification Explained
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3048 — Romans 3:20
Statement on main theme; justification; ungodliness and unrighteousness; God's wrath on Jews and Gentiles; every mouth stopped; the function of the law.

Podcasts.Title: The Turning Point: But Now
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3049 — Romans 3:21-31
The only way of salvation; 'but now' in our experience and in history; analysis of verses 21-31; the gospel of God; the Old Testament preparation.

Podcasts.Title: More than Forgiveness
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3050 — Romans 3:21-31
The vital historic event of Christ's coming; a positive righteousness; not by lawkeeping; but by faith; earned by Christ; the universal need.

Podcasts.Title: By Free Grace Alone
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3051 — Romans 3:24
The centrality of justification; free grace; the ransom price and the slavery of sin; taught by Christ and the other apostles also.

Podcasts.Title: Propitiation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3052 — Romans 3:25
The essential doctrine of the atonement; the meaning of 'propitiation'; modern translations and denials of this; 'wrath'; the vital issue; deliverance provided by the offended party.

Podcasts.Title: The Blood of Jesus Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3053 — Romans 3:25
Another essential word; hated and misunderstood; true and false interpretations; the sacrificial death; the substitute; the new covenant.

Podcasts.Title: The Vindication of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3054 — Romans 3:25-26
The reconciliation of eternal love and eternal justice; remission and pretermission; previous forbearance; sin actually seen to be punished; the cross declaring God's love and justice.

Podcasts.Title: Boasting Excluded
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3055 — Romans 3:27-31
Necessity for argument; especially polemic; first deduction from the Gospel; boasting is excluded; faith not a work; Paul and James.

Podcasts.Title: Distinctions Abolished
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3056 — Romans 3:29-31
Second deduction; no difference between Jews and Gentiles in the way of salvation; 'by' and 'through'; no compromise with other religions; the gospel the only basis of fellowship.

Podcasts.Title: The Law Established
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 3 — #3057 — Romans 3:31
Third deduction; meaning of 'law'; erroneous views rejected; seven ways in which the gospel; especially the cross; honours the law. Conclusion of chapter three; reasons for modern rejection of this teaching.

Podcasts.Title: Certainty of Salvation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3063 — Romans 5:1-2
Analysis of chapters 5-8; showing that the main theme is not sanctification but the certainty of final salvation; chapter 5:1-11: the consequences of justification; through our Lord Jesus Christ; 'peace with God' before 'the peace of God'.

Podcasts.Title: Having Peace with God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3064 — Romans 5:1-2
The manward and Godward sides of 'peace with God'; six tests of our justification; peace and assurance; the characteristics of true and false peace.

Podcasts.Title: Standing in Grace
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3065 — Romans 5:1-2
Access to God; our once-for-ever introduction into the state of grace; its privileges and blessings; the security of our standing; boldness and assurance.

Podcasts.Title: Glory Begun Below
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3066 — Romans 5:1-2
Boasting and exulting in hope; 'the glory of God'; glorification and physical resurrection; 'glory begun below'; the sense of glory.

Podcasts.Title: Times of Trial
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3067 — Romans 5:3-5
The Christian's reaction to trials contrasted with that of the cults; not resignation but glorying; understanding God's purpose in trials; the final result.

Podcasts.Title: Glory in Tribulation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3068 — Romans 5:5
Hope leads not to shame but to overcoming; the direct; experimental assurance of God's love; supporting testimonies; exhortation to seek this knowledge of God's love.

Podcasts.Title: The Holy Spirit and Assurance
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3069 — Romans 5:5
The Holy Spirit and assurance; the proof of God's working within us; the guarantee of our perseverance in faith; the evidence of the Spirit's presence by His work in us.

Podcasts.Title: Love That Produces Salvation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3070 — Romans 5:6-8
Verses 6-8 an exposition of the Father's love; no conflict with His justice; God's love commended in relation to the time; the sending and death of Christ and the character of those saved.

Podcasts.Title: Grace; So Rich and Free
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3071 — Romans 5:6-11
God's love for sinners; the meaning of ungodliness; the righteous man and the good man; the death of Christ; God's love the ground of our assurance.

Podcasts.Title: Justified by God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3072 — Romans 5:9-10
'Much more then'; salvation past; present and future; Christ's blood the ground of our justification; the finality of God's pronouncement of justification.

Podcasts.Title: Security in Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3073 — Romans 5:10
Further argument from the greater to the lesser; objective and subjective aspects of enmity; the necessity of Christ's death for reconciliation; the security of those who have been grafted into Christ.

Podcasts.Title: Glorying in God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3074 — Romans 5:10-11
Glorying in God and causes of not doing so; inadequate understanding of justification by faith; lack of meditation; failure to reason from the Scriptures; self-examination and rejoicing.

Podcasts.Title: The Mechanics of Interpretation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3075 — Romans 5:12
New section; connection with preceding verses; linked especially with 'in his life'; passage seen as an introduction to chapters 6-8; the two heads of the human race; the importance of the section.

Podcasts.Title: As in Adam; so in Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3076 — Romans 5:12-21
General analysis of the passage; comparison and contrast of Christ with Adam; the universality of sin and death; the contrary explanations of evolutionary philosophy and the Bible.

Podcasts.Title: For All Sinned
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3077 — Romans 5:12-21
The meaning of 'all have sinned'; the imputation of Adam's sin; the parallel with the imputation of Christ's righteousness; the doctrine of original sin.

Podcasts.Title: Made Alive in Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3078 — Romans 5:12
Our relationship to Adam; the realistic view and the federal view; the authority of the apostles defended; Adam the type of Christ; the similarities and the differences.

Podcasts.Title: The Gift of Righteousness
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3081 — Romans 5:16-17
One offence and many offences; condemnation and justification; the reign of death; the gift of righteousness and our reign in life.

Podcasts.Title: The Obedience of Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3082 — Romans 5:18-19
The judicial effects of Adam's sin; the judicial effects of Christ's obedience; our position in Christ; no longer in Adam; the Christian's assurance in spite of sin.

Podcasts.Title: The Law Came In
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 4 — #3083 — Romans 5:20-21
The function of the Law; increasing man's knowledge of sin; convicting of sin; inciting to sin; bringing men to Christ; the necessity for a law-work.

Podcasts.Title: An Introduction
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3089 — Romans 6:1-2
Introductory analysis; chapter 6 a parenthesis; the problem of antinomianism stated; the 'danger' of the doctrine of justification by faith; correct translation of verse 2.

Podcasts.Title: Transferred to The Reign of Grace
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3090 — Romans 6:1-2
Realising our position; various interpretations of the key phrase considered; death to the reign of sin; the impossibility of continuing in sin.

Podcasts.Title: Union with Christ
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3091 — Romans 6:3
Union with Christ; the kind of baptism referred to; this doctrine common knowledge; the status of all Christians; baptism into the whole Christ.

Podcasts.Title: New Life
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3092 — Romans 6:3-4
The implications of our union with Christ; union in His death; burial and resurrection; past objective facts; not exhortations; the glorious power of God; life in the new realm.

Podcasts.Title: The Old Man Was Crucified
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3093 — Romans 6:5-6
The likeness of Christ's resurrection; now and future; the old man and his crucifixion; the knowledge of faith leading to glorious experiences.

Podcasts.Title: Freed from Sin
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3094 — Romans 6:6-7
The negative consequences of our crucifixion with Christ; 'the old man' and the body of sin distinguished; sin in the body disannulled; freedom from the slavery of sin.

Podcasts.Title: Freed from the Tyranny of Sin
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3095 — Romans 6:7
Reconciliation of Romans 6:6 and Ephesians 4:22-24; practical encouragement; translation of 'freed' defended; freedom from the tyranny of sin; the safety of the believer.

Podcasts.Title: Christ's Death Unto Sin
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3096 — Romans 6:8-10
The positive aspect; Paul's use of the future in verse 8; Christ's relationship to sin; the significance of His resurrection; Christ's death unto sin.

Podcasts.Title: No More in Realm of Sin and Death
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3097 — Romans 6:10-11
Christ's life unto God; contrast with His humiliation; drawing the right conclusion about ourselves; what Paul is not saying.

Podcasts.Title: Free in Christ Jesus
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3098 — Romans 6:11
The Christian's death to the reign of sin; its finality; the end of death's dominion; the law's condemnation and sin's bondage; the backslider.

Podcasts.Title: Dead to Sin; Alive to God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3099 — Romans 6:11
The Christian under the reign of grace; a new relationship to God; God's purpose of holiness for us; its certain fulfilment; practical consequences of a proper 'reckoning'.

Podcasts.Title: Let Not Sin Reign
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3100 — Romans 6:12-14
Therefore' and the necessity for the application of teaching; the New Testament way of teaching holiness; 'let not sin reign in your mortal bodies'; motives and encouragement to sanctification.

Podcasts.Title: Servants of Righteousness
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3105 — Romans 6:18
(No notes available)

Podcasts.Title: The Infirmity of the Flesh
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3106 — Romans 6:19
The use of analogy; willing slavery; the infirmity of the flesh; spiritual discernment; growth in understanding.

Podcasts.Title: Changed from Glory into Glory
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3108 — Romans 6:20-21
But now'; the new life; Christian freedom; Christian slavery; Christian fruit.

Podcasts.Title: Servants of Sin
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3109 — Romans 6:22
Supporting arguments for holy living; the old life; freedom from righteousness; fruitlessness; shame and death.

Podcasts.Title: The Gift of God
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 5 — #3110 — Romans 6:23
Summary and conclusion; two contrasting possibilities for man; the master we serve; the conditions of service; the ultimate end; all through Jesus Christ our Lord.

Podcasts.Title: Biblical Accountancy
Podcasts.Description:
Other Sermons — #5509 — Romans 6:21
The Bible a book of accountancy likened to a profit and loss account; man either serves God or is a slave to the devil; no such thing as free will; the life of sin and the life of God contrasted; the sinful life always leads to shame.

Podcasts.Title: The Christian and God's Law
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3111 — Romans 7:1
The correct approach to a controversial chapter; the purpose of the chapter; a bird's-eye view; the relevance of the teaching; three mistakes made by Christians.

Podcasts.Title: Not Subject to the Law
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3112 — Romans 7:1-4
Law in general; the indirect approach; marriage as a picture of the unbeliever's relationship to the Law; four reasons for choosing this illustration; the nature of our death to the Law.

Podcasts.Title: The Essentials of Salvation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3113 — Romans 7:4
A general definition of the Christian life; a radical change; the tests of life; the centrality of Christ; the body of Christ; crucified and raised.

Podcasts.Title: Union with Christ: its Nature
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3114 — Romans 7:4
Union with Christ in His death to the Law; the old husband and the new; loyalty to the new husband; an indissoluble relationship

Podcasts.Title: Union - its Privileges and Purpose
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3115 — Romans 7:4
The privileges of our marriage; our possessions in Christ; His love and care; fruit; the purpose of the union.

Podcasts.Title: The Nature of Sin
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3116 — Romans 7:5-6
The necessity of the change; life in the flesh; passions and lusts; the positive power of sin; the futility of morality

Podcasts.Title: Life in the Spirit
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3117 — Romans 7:6
The completeness of the change for all Christians; our discharge from the Law's control; the aim of our deliverance; the new slavery; letter and spirit.

Podcasts.Title: In the Spirit or in the Flesh?
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3118 — Romans 7:6
Seven particular differences between the old life and the new; the external and the internal; understanding; letter and spirit; motive; liberty; power; progression to glory.

Podcasts.Title: The Purpose of the Law
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3119 — Romans 7:7
The vindication of the Law; the preliminary 'law-work'; lusts and sin; the tenth commandment; and Paul's knowledge of sin.

Podcasts.Title: Sins Nature and Character
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3120 — Romans 7:8
Sin as a power; the Law used as a fulcrum; the slave master; the aggravation of lawlessness; practical conclusions.

Podcasts.Title: Sin Revealed By the Law
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3121 — Romans 7:9
An analysis of his own experience; sin lying dormant; the 'coming' of the Law; self-confidence dies; the test of our reaction to the Law.

Podcasts.Title: The Deceitfulness of Sin
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3122 — Romans 7:10-11
The Law and life; the Law and death; diagnosis of the moral state of the country; sin's use of the Law to deceive; the darkening of the understanding.

Podcasts.Title: Sin Uses Law to Produce Death
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3123 — Romans 7:12-13
The holiness and goodness of the Law; the exposure of the sinfulness of sin; Paul's experience under conviction of sin; the time of this experience.

Podcasts.Title: Introduction to Verses 14-25
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3124 — Romans 7:14
Three interpretations of this verse and those following; the inductive method; general analysis of the section; the theme still the function of the Law; the change of tense; the meaning of 'carnal'.

Podcasts.Title: Carnal Man: 1) Situation
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3125 — Romans 7:14-15
The key phrase; the implications of 'sold under sin' for the various views; verse 15; a description of his life as a whole; defeat; failure and regeneration.

Podcasts.Title: Carnal Man: 2) Dual Personality
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3126 — Romans 7:16-20
Logical inferences; a daring statement; a complicated description of duality; confession; not excuse; sin frustrating the Law.

Podcasts.Title: Carnal Man: 3) The Battle Within
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3127 — Romans 7:21-23
The law of his daily experience; the inward man and the members; a different law; various interpretations of 'captivity'; an anguished cry of defeat.

Podcasts.Title: The Wretched Man Identity (1)
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3128 — Romans 7:25
An interjection of praise; consideration of the passage as a whole; comparison with other; apparently similar; passages; Galatians 5; 1 Corinthians 9; etc.; show victory not defeat.

Podcasts.Title: The Wretched Man Identity (2)
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 6 — #3129 — Romans 7:13-25

Volume 14 — #3370 — Romans 14:17
Christians must think differently; as befits citizens of the kingdom; the Church is not a democracy; seek first the kingdom of God; the kingdom is larger than any individual aspect; how this greatness is to be shown to the world.

Podcasts.Title: The Realm of Righteousness
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 14 — #3371 — Romans 14:17
Righteousness: imputed or ethical? right personal relationships; more than an ethical statement; belonging to the realm of righteousnes?Christians are like Jesus Christ the righteous.

Podcasts.Title: Peace in the Holy Spirit
Podcasts.Description:
Volume 14 — #3372 — Romans 14:17
A morbid scrupulosity ruins peace; it leads to a censorious spirit; it harms our relationship with God; peace from the God of peace; reconciliation with God leads to peace within; and with each other; rejoicing in the Prince of Peace.

The person and character of Paul; Paul's way of dealing with problems; the modern counterparts of the problems of the Roman church; no compromise on the essentials; tests of the Christian life.

The kingdom is within; the kingdom is not to be confused with religion; false ideas about Christianity; the world judged in righteousness; guilt imputed to Christ; testing our Christianity.
